images.name: Pig Close-up
images.alt: A Red Wattle hog’s muddy snout looking at the camera
images.description: A curious Red Wattle hog gazing directly at the lens, its snout lightly coated with moist soil.

images.name: Pig in Forest
images.alt: A Red Wattle hog exploring under oak trees
images.description: A happy hog rooting among scattered leaves, savoring the natural environment beneath majestic oak trees.

images.name: Foraging Pig
images.alt: A Red Wattle hog near a fence in the forest
images.description: A pasture-raised hog casually foraging near a simple wire fence, with another hog visible in the background.

images.name: Pig’s Snout Close-up
images.alt: A muddy Red Wattle hog’s snout seen up close
images.description: A close-up view of the hog’s snout, showing evidence of recent playful digging in rich, fertile soil.

images.name: Pig Portrait
images.alt: A front-facing Red Wattle hog portrait
images.description: A calm, attentive hog captured head-on, its gentle expression reflecting a life lived peacefully outdoors.
